channel.title: 3d-Printing on Adam Thompson's Lab Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in 3d-Printing on Adam Thompson's Lab Notebook

item.title: Building a Homemade Spirit Box
item.description: I am certainly no believer in the paranormal. My mother, on the other hand, is a different story. As such, she recently requested that I design and build a spirit box for her. Being that I am not one to turn down an opportunity to tinker on a new project, I decided to oblige. What the Hell is a Spirit Box? The first quest I needed to answer in this project is what in the hell is a spirit box anyway?

item.title: Building Serenity OS on Windows with WSL 2
item.description: I’ve been following the development of Serenity OS with a fair bit of interest for the past few months. As such, I’ve been itching to try building the system and playing around with it. I finally got a bit of time and decided that, for a bit of an extra challenge, I’d attempt to get it running through WSL 2 on Windows 10. This is something that is actually officially documented in the GitHub repository, but I ran into a few roadblocks along the way.
